判官: (ぞう) - (はんがん, ほうがん only) judge/magistrate; 3rd grade official (ritsuryo system)/assistant district officer/inspector
判官贔屓: (ほうがんびいき) - (yoji) sympathy for a tragic hero; rooting for the underdog
判定: (はんてい) - judgement; judgment; decision; adjudication; award; verdict; determination
判定会議: (はんていかいぎ) - adjudication committee meeting; decision conference
判定勝ち: (はんていがち) - winning a decision
判定負け: (はんていまけ) - losing a decision (on points)
判断: (handan) - julgamento, decisão, conclusão, sentença; adivinhação, julgamento, decisão, conclusão, sentença; adivinhação; julgamento
判断ミス: (はんだんミス) - error of judgment; miscalculation
判断中止: (はんだんちゅうし) - suspension of judgement (judgment)
判断力: (はんだんりょく) - judgment; judgement; discernment
判断命令: (はんだんめいれい) - decision instruction
判断基準: (はんだんきじゅん) - evaluation criteria; evaluation standard
判断規準: (はんだんきじゅん) - evaluation criteria; evaluation standard
判明: (はんめい) - establishing; proving; ascertaining; identifying; confirming
判決: (はんけつ) - judicial decision; judgement; judgment; sentence; decree
判決が下る: (はんけつがくだる) - to be judged; to be sentenced
判決に従う: (はんけつにしたがう) - to abide by the verdict
判決を覆す: (はんけつをくつがえす) - to overrule a decision
判決文: (はんけつぶん) - judgment paper; judgement paper
判決理由: (はんけつりゆう) - {law} ratio decidendi; reason for a verdict
判決離婚: (はんけつりこん) - divorce by decree
判然: (はんぜん) - clear; distinct; evident; definite
判示: (はんじ) - opinion (in legal context)/indication; to hold that (in legal context)/to judge that
判読: (はんどく) - decipherment; interpretation; making out; identification
別: (betsu/waka) - separate , distinction, difference, discrimination; separate, different, another, extra; exception, exclusion; classified by, ranked by, according to
別々に: (べつべつに) - separately; apart; severally; individually
別けて: (わけて) - above all; especially; particularly; all the more
別ける: (わける) - to divide (into)/to split (into)/to part/to separate/to divide up/to classify/to sort out/to divide out; to share/to distribute/to deal out/to dish out; to distinguish/to discriminate/to differentiate (between); to break up (a fight)/to mediate; to call a draw/to tie; to push one's way through (a crowd); (also written as 頒ける) to sell
別け前: (わけまえ) - share; portion; quota; cut
別け隔て: (わけへだて) - distinction; favoritism; favouritism; discrimination
別ち与える: (わかちあたえる) - to divide and pass around
別つ: (わかつ) - to divide/to separate; (also written as 頒つ) to share/to distribute; to distinguish
別て: (わけて) - above all; especially; particularly; all the more
別として: (べつとして) - other than; except for; aside from; apart from; save for
別なく: (べつなく) - (often as ...の別なく) irrespective (e.g. of age); without discrimination; without distinction
別に: (betsuni) - (não) particularmente, (não) especialmente, (não) de forma especial; separadamente, à parte, adicionalmente, extra
別れ: (wakare) - partida, separação, despedida, ramificação (lateral), bifurcação, ramo, divisão, seção
別れさせる: (わかれさせる) - to destroy a relationship
別れさせ屋: (わかれさせや) - professional relationship destroyers
別れる: (わかれる) - to be divided; to part from; to separate; to bid farewell
別れを告げる: (わかれをつげる) - to say goodbye; to bid farewell
別れを惜しむ: (わかれをおしむ) - to loathe to part with
別れ争う: (わかれあらそう) - to quarrel and separate
別れ別れになる: (わかれわかれになる) - to separate (e.g. people); to part
別れ目: (わかれめ) - fork/junction/parting of the ways; turning point
別れ話: (わかればなし) - talk about divorce or separation
別れ路: (わかれじ) - parting of the ways; the way to hades; one's way after the parting
別れ道: (わかれみち) - branch; forked road; crossroads; branch road; parting of the ways; turning point
別れ際: (わかれぎわ) - at parting; on parting
別れ霜: (わかれじも) - late frost; frost in late spring
別乾坤: (べっけんこん) - otherworld; another world
別人: (べつにん) - different person; someone else; changed man
別件: (べっけん) - separate case; another matter
別会計: (べつかいけい) - separate account; separate charge
別体: (べったい) - different form; different shape
別便: (べつびん) - separate post; separate mail; separate cover
別働隊: (べつどうたい) - flying column; detached force
別冊: (bessatsu) - volume separado, edição extra, suplemento, volume adicional, volume suplementar
別册: (べっさつ) - separate volume; extra issue; supplement; additional volume; supplementary volume
別別に: (べつべつに) - separately; apart; severally; individually
別刷り: (べつずり) - excerpt; offprint; printed separately
別動隊: (べつどうたい) - flying column; detached force
別口: (べつくち) - different item; different lot
別名: (べつみょう) - alias; pseudonym; pen name; nom de plume; different name; other name
別命: (べつめい) - another or separate order
別品: (べっぴん) - beautiful woman/beauty/pretty girl; (別品 only) high-quality goods/special article
別問題: (べつもんだい) - different thing; another question; different case
別売: (べつばい) - selling separately; not included in the price
別婚: (べっこん) - separation with divorce in the offing
別嬪: (べっぴん) - beautiful woman/beauty/pretty girl; (別品 only) high-quality goods/special article
別字: (べつじ) - different letter; different character; different spelling
別室: (べっしつ) - separate room; special room
